===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[telephone]]; [[phone]]
#: {{zh-x|當 你 不 在 的 時候{hou}，電話 響 了。|The '''phone''' rang when you weren't here.}}
# [[telephone call]]
#: {{zh-x|我 給 你 打.電話。|I'll give you a '''call'''.}}
# [[telephone number]]
#: {{zh-x|你 的 電話 是 多少？|What's your '''phone number'''?}}

====Usage notes====
Note that in Mandarin, the noun {{zh-l|電話|telephone}} is used in any verb involving a phone, such as {{zh-l|打電話|to make a phone call}}, {{zh-l|回電話|to call back}}, {{zh-l|接電話|to answer the phone}}, etc.

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|でん|わ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
{{w|Wasei kango}}, from {{compound|電|t1=[[electric]]|tr1=den|lang=ja|話|t2=[[conversation]]|tr2=wa}}. See also {{m|ja|話す|tr=hanasu}}.

{{ja-pron|でんわ|acc=h|y=o|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|でんわ}}

# [[telephone]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''電話'''を引く|'''でんわ''' を ひく|to install a '''telephone'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|'''電話'''に出る|'''でんわ''' に でる|to answer the '''phone'''}}
# [[telephone call]]; [[phone call]]; [[call]]

#: {{ja-usex|'''電話'''を切る|'''でんわ''' を きる|to hang up}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|でんわ}}

# to make a [[phone call]]; to [[telephone]]; to [[call]]

====Usage notes====
* In order to imply whom one is calling as is done in English with the preposition {{term|to}} in {{term||make a phone call '''to'''}} or by the [[objective case]] as {{term|him}} in the sentence {{term||I called '''him'''}}, the Japanese use [[に]] ([[ni]]):
#: {{ja-usex|私は彼に'''電話する'''つもりだ。|^わたし は かれ に '''でんわ する''' つもり だ。|I'm going to '''call''' him.}}
